page.title: 20The Tavern in Kirkfieldbank.
page.content: In the village of Kirkfieldbank is a public house called "The Tavern". It is opposite the War Memorial and Mr.Riley's butcher shop. There are two parts to the "pub" - the lounge bar and the public bar. Local residents usually go to the public bar. Newcomers to the village and holidaymakers most often go to the lounge bar. The lounge bar is the most comfortable of the two places, having soft chairs and polished wooden tables. Here you can order and enjoy a drink with your friends, or eat a bar snack of fish and chips for example, or even have a three course meal in good company. The bar is open from 11am. in the morning until 2.30pm.and again from 5pm. until 11.30pm in the evening.
